description: A sporty vest for many occasions. The Whitehorn Men is made of recycled Pertex® Quantum and keeps you warm thanks to the combination of down with filling made of recycled material in the shoulder sections. All of this makes the Whitehorn more durable and suited to ensure optimal temperature regulation. Three pockets offer space for keys, phone and other belongings. The practical Whitehorn vest can be put on quickly and is perfect for hiking, your work commute, travel or simply enjoying cold days outdoors.
name: Mammut Whitehorn IN Vest - Mens
